author: Anonymous Atom
title: Order of subclasses [Itemization]
question:
Hi!
if we have more than 2 subclasses for Itemization
order of the subclasses do matter?  is there any convention about it?
ex) 
Status is one of...
Natural  (atomic-non-distinct)
false      (atomic-distinct)
"H"        (atomic-distinct)
Status is one of...
false      (atomic-distinct)
"H"        (atomic-distinct)
Natural  (atomic-non-distinct)
They are both acceptable?
instructor_answer:
Choose the order that makes the most sense for that data definition. It's up to you.
BUT whatever order the type comment is in the template needs to be in the same order, AND of course all the functions have the same order as the template.
